channel.title: The Cat Life
channel.description: Recent content on The Cat Life

item.title: The New Neighbours
item.description: With the pandemic in full swing, and the Canadian housing market hotter than ever, there’s been a flurry of action in my neighbourhood as houses get bought and sold at a dizzying rate. A common concern with families coming in is whether it’s going to disrupt your way of living. Will they be noisy? Will they be rude? Will they have tacky sense of design? Sometimes though, you get lucky.

item.title: An Indoor Cat in the Forest
item.description: I’ve always self-identified my spirit animal as the noble raccoon. Something about its bandit face and clever hands finding discarded food (or trash) always spoke to me (#4age4lyfe). Those who know me best however tell me that I am in reality much closer to a bougie indoor cat; preferring my beds soft and my plumbing indoors.

item.title: The Amazing World of Nature
item.description: I met the shyest little cutie today. I barely managed to snap a few shots before she ran by me!

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Welcome to my site! I know what you’re wondering: yes, it’ll mostly be cat photos. I hope you’re into that.
